text: Ate jihare loka ba'ada vica imana li'a'e ate hijarata kiti, tuhade nala mila ke jihada kita uha vi tuhade vicom hi hana. Alaha di kitaba anusara lahu sarika risatedara ika-duje de vadhere hakadara hana. Besaka alaha hara ciza da jananahara hai. 9. Surata ata tauba suru alaha de nama nala jihara ati'ata miharabana ate rahima furama'una vala hai
